Package org.ambraproject.wombat.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleController
    Controller for rendering an article.
    BrowseController
    Controller for the browse page.
    FigureImageController  
    FigurePageController  
    HomeController
    Handles requests for a site home page.
    IndirectFileController
    Forwards requests for files to the content repository.
    NotFoundController
    Controller intended to serve "nice" 404 pages, using the styling of the site, if possible.
    RootController
    Handles requests to the application root.
    SearchController
    Controller class for user-initiated searches.
    SiteResolver
    Bean that resolves requests to the sites that the application hosts.
    StaticResourceController  
    TaxonomyController
    Controller that handles JSON requests from the taxonomy browser.
    TemplatePageController  
    UserController
    Controller for user related actions
    WombatController
    Base class with common functionality for all controllers in the application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArticleNotFoundException
    Exception type thrown when no article exists at a given DOI.
    NotFoundException
    Indicates that the user requested an entity that does not exist, or didn't supply a required parameter (including supplying an empty string as the parameter).
    NotVisibleException
    Indicates that, even though an article or related entity exists, the user should get a 404 status because the content should not be accessible through the present request.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    SiteParam
    Annotates a Controller method parameter that should be injected with a org.ambraproject.wombat.config.Site object, to indicate which site the request belongs to.
